mapper.select: SELECT T001.employeeNo, T001.employeeFristName, concat(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName) as employeeName, T002.companyMail FROM T001Employee as T001 left join T002EmployeeDetail as T002 on T001.employeeNo = T002.employeeNo where left(T001.employeeNo,2) != "BP" and left(T001.employeeNo,2) != "SP" and ((T002.employeeFormCode != "4" or T002.retirementYearAndMonth > now() or T002.retirementResonClassification = "2"))
